title: Everything You Need to Know About the Rubber Fruit in Blox Fruits

steps.title: The Rubber Fruit is a Rare Natural-type Blox Fruit.
steps.content: The Rubber Fruit is a Rare Natural-type Blox Fruit. You can get it from the Blox Fruit Dealer for $750,000 or 1,200 Robux. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Rubber is a great fruit for grinding.
steps.content: Rubber is a great fruit for grinding. It also gives you a ton of mobility thanks to the Slingshot move, which can be used to propel yourself across the water and far distances. #*Rubber's passive also gives you immunity to guns and attacks from Rumble Fruit and Electric Fruit.

steps.title: Cannon (Z)
steps.content: Cannon ( Z ) Mastery cost: 25 Mastery Damage: 3402-3939 Cooldown: 7.5 seconds Description: You pull your arms backwards. When releasing Z , your arms will fling forward, dealing damage and inflicting knockback. Transformed: When transformed, this move breaks instinct.

steps.title: Smash (X)
steps.content: Smash ( X ) Mastery cost: 50 Mastery Damage: 4118-4476 Cooldown: 9 seconds Description: You stretch your right leg upwards. When releasing X , your leg will slam down, dealing damage and inflicting knockback. Transformed: When transformed, this move breaks instinct.

steps.title: Rush(C)
steps.content: Rush( C ) Mastery cost: 125 Mastery Damage: 1074-10742 Cooldown: 16.5 seconds Description: You release a flurry of punches in the direction you're facing. The longer you hold down C , the longer you will punch. Transformed: When transformed, this move breaks instinct.

steps.title: Transformation (V)
steps.content: Transformation ( V ) Mastery cost: 225 Mastery Damage: N/A Cooldown: 17 seconds Description: You transform into rubber, which makes your skin pink, and you will start to emit steam. When transformed, your animations are faster, and your moves do more damage, but your energy regeneration is reduced by 25%. You will stay transformed as long as you have energy and don't die. Transformed: You turn back into your normal state.

steps.title: Slingshot (F)
steps.content: Slingshot ( F ) Mastery cost: 80 Mastery Damage: 3010-4566 Cooldown: 6 seconds Description: You stretch both arms out in the direction the cursor is pointing. If you hit an object, you'll be launched forward toward that object. The farther you are from the object, the further you will go when you fly forward. Transformed: You will go much farther than your untransformed version.

steps.title: Rubber Body
steps.content: Rubber Body You have immunity to all guns, Rumble Fruit, Electric Fruit, and Aura effects. You are not immune, however, to the Electric Claw or Pole (1st or 2nd form). This passive is similar to Elemental Reflex.

steps.title: Pros
steps.content: Pros Passive lets you be immune to certain damage types Does a lot of damage Tons of range and mobility All moves are AoE Transformation can be used indefinitely if you don't run out of energy

steps.title: Cons
steps.content: Cons Grinding can be tricky due to knockback None of the untransformed moves break instinct Transformation holds you in place, so it can be punished Slingshot move can't be used to traverse open areas Smash attack is easy for enemies to evade
